thread.section_title: LEAF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LEAF | www.leafnow.com
thread.title: Theodora - Left Coast Brewing Co.
thread.title_full: LEAF reviewed by Theodora - Left Coast Brewing Co.

author: Theodora - Left Coast Brewing Co.
title: Theodora - Left Coast Brewing Co.
text:
We used Leaf to get a loan for a new beer canning line. They were very professional and we received the loan we needed. Before shipment we were surprised with a delivery charge much higher than we expected and Leaf was very accommodating to add it to the existing loan. They saved
the day. Would use and recommend them to everyone.
